thought: To craft a hopper, I need to craft a chest first. To craft a chest, I need to place 8 wooden planks in the crafting table. I already have 8 wooden planks in my inventory, so I will start by moving one of them to the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 1 with quantity 1
